cause.description:
Students Helping Honduras is a nonprofit organization with a mission to provide fundamental human needs to orphaned and impoverished children in Honduras. This includes, but is not limited to, educational opportunities, nourishment, access to adequate shelter, clean water, general livelihood, and a chance to participate in sports.
You may Learn more about Students Helping Honduras by visiting our website,
http://www.studentshelpinghonduras.org
1. Director: Shin Fujiyama
2. President: Cosmo Fujiyama
3. Staff: Alex Escobar, Russ Altenburg, Bobby Durrette, Clare Timmis, Walker Somerville
cause.mission: Our mission is to mobilize students in a massive and focused effort to empower orphaned and at-risk children in Honduras to reach their full potential
cause.name: Students Helping Honduras
